description: The Microsoft 365 Audit General & DLP solution provides capability to ingest M365 Audit.General and Audit.DLP logs into Microsoft Sentinel using the Codeless Connector Framework (CCF). This solution enables comprehensive auditing and DLP monitoring for Microsoft 365 environments.
descriptionMarkdown:
**Note:** Please refer to the following before installing the solution:

• Review the solution [Release Notes](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/tree/master/Solutions/Microsoft%20365%20Audit%20General%20and%20DLP/ReleaseNotes.md)

• There may be [known issues](https://aka.ms/sentinelsolutionsknownissues) pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

The [Microsoft 365 Audit.General and Audit.DLP](https://docs.microsoft.com/office/office-365-management-api/office-365-management-activity-api-schema#auditlogrecordtype) solution provides the capability to ingest specialty audit logs into Microsoft Sentinel using the Codeless Connector Platform (CCP).

**Underlying Microsoft Technologies used:**

This solution takes a dependency on the following technologies, and some of these dependencies either may be in [Preview](https://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/preview-supplemental-terms/) state or might result in additional ingestion or operational costs:

a. [Codeless Connector Platform (CCP)](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/create-codeless-connector)

b. [Data Collection Rules (DCR)](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/essentials/data-collection-rule-overview)

**Data Connectors:** 2, **Custom Tables:** 1

[Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel](https://aka.ms/azuresentinel) | [Learn more about Solutions](https://aka.ms/azuresentinelsolutionsdoc)
